epd_metadata.declared_product: Cement products produced by Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V.
epd_metadata.declaration_owner: Holcim México Operaciones S.A. de C.V.

product_description.company_description: Holcim Mexico produces and markets cement, ready-mix concrete, and other products and services for construction.
product_description.product_scope: This EPD is prepared for products classified as UN CPC Group 3744-Cement or CSI MasterFormat Division 03 30 00 Cast-in-Place Concrete.

lca_information.study_goal: To comply with the procedures for creating a Type III environmental product declaration (EPD) and publish the EPD for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of the total inflows (mass and energy) to the upstream and core modules.
lca_information.data_sources_and_quality: Primary data from Holcim México Operaciones SA de CV's plant, ecoinvent v3.0 database, and local EPD database.

recycled_materials_handling.module_a1_material_losses: Default loss factors assumed due to lack of data.

additional_info.limitations: This EPD is a declaration of potential environmental impact and does not support or provide definitive comparisons of the environmental performance of specific products.

other_references: USGBC LEED v4 for Building Design and Construction
USGBC PCR Committee Process & Resources: Part B
